Action.Name: Screen.Back
Action.Description: Moves back one screen in the history of the viewed screens. This action behaves like the back button on a Web Browser.

Action.Name: Screen.End
Action.Description: Jumps to the end of the current screen list and starts the next stage in the install.

Action.Name: Screen.GetFocus
Action.Description: Gets the ID of the control that currently has focus on the screen.

Action.Name: Screen.GetLocalizedString
Action.Description: Gets the text of a string ID in the current language on the current screen.

Arg.Name: StringID
Arg.Description: The screen string ID whose localized text you want to get.

Action.Name: Screen.GetProperties
Action.Description: Gets the properties of the currently displayed screen.

Action.Name: Screen.Jump
Action.Description: Jumps to a specific screen in your install given a screen name.

Arg.Name: ScreenName
Arg.Description: The name of the screen you want to jump to.

Action.Name: Screen.Next
Action.Description: Proceeds to the next screen in the screen list according to the order in the screen manager at design time.

Action.Name: Screen.Previous
Action.Description: Proceeds to the previous screen that is in your screen list according to their order in the screen manager at design time.

Action.Name: Screen.SetFocus
Action.Description: Sets which control has focus on the current screen.

Arg.Name: CtrlID
Arg.Description: The ID of the control that will get the focus.

Action.Name: Screen.SetLocalizedString
Action.Description: Sets the text of a String ID in the current language on the current screen.

Arg.Name: StringID
Arg.Description: The string ID whose text you want to set.

Arg.Name: Text
Arg.Description: The text you want you want to display for the string ID.

Action.Name: Screen.SetStartScreen
Action.Description: Sets the first screen that will be displayed in the next screen list that is displayed. This action can be called to affect either the Before Installing or After Installing screens.

Arg.Name: ScreenName
Arg.Description: The name of the screen you want to show first in the next screen list that is displayed.

Action.Name: Screen.StartTimer
Action.Description: Starts a timer on the current screen.

Action.Name: Screen.StopTimer
Action.Description: Stops a timer on the current screen.
